title: Hour 1: Kyrie-turning
description:
Freddie Coleman and Courtney Cronin react to Kyrie Irving telling The Athletic that he is opting into $36.5 million option with the Nets. The crew debates if Kyrie will be with the Nets long-term, if the Lakers are better off without him, who the biggest threat to the Warriors in the Western Conference is, and much more. Sam Acho stops by to discuss which 2nd-year QB will make the biggest jump this season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Kyrie Irving says he is opting into $36.5 million player option.
